chain-of-thought.notes: P5 requires extended output for REASONING/REDACTIONS/OUTPUT sections. 2048 output tokens accommodates queries with 15+ candidate entities. 8192 context prevents any possible input truncation.

qwen3-4b.notes: presence_penalty=1.5 prevents a known repetition/looping issue in Qwen 3 at temperature=0. num_ctx=32768 matches the native context window (32K base, extendable to 256K with YaRN but not used here). The /no_think prefix is injected by the runner, not set here.

canary.query: Patient John Doe, MRN 123456, was seen at Springfield General Hospital on January 15, 2024 for evaluation of type 2 diabetes. His A1c was 8.2% and blood pressure was 142/88.
canary.notes: Fixed canary query inserted at positions 0 and 1052 (after last real query). If canary results differ between position 0 and 1052, context drift has occurred. Canary results are logged but excluded from all metrics.

determinism_seeds.notes: If the variance pilot determines outputs are NOT byte-identical, use different seeds per run instead of repeating seed=42.
